stimulusHtml: Which of the following statements accurately reflects the Chinese Neo-Confucian artistic tradition that is embodied in Fan Kuanâ€™s Travelers among Mountains and Streams ?
choicesHtml: Landscape painting should be above all a means of self-expression.
Nature should be depicted as a metaphor for moral and orderly life.
The depiction of nature should be as faithful as possible to what is observed.
Landscape is a preferred subject because it is immoral to depict individual people.
